Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses temp. rerouted EB: Roosevelt, Michigan, 16th, and Wabash; WB: Wabash and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Roosevelt/Michigan, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Michigan, 16th, and Wabash.

Westbound buses will operate via Wabash and Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 54th/Cermak and Pulaski
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Pulaski and 54th/Cermak due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Pulaski and 54th/Cermak due to track conditions.

As a result, trains are operating only between the Loop and Pulaski at this time.

Shuttle buses are in place to provide connecting service through the affected area Pulaski to 54th/Cermak.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

 

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
